params.about_text: HI,I hope you too have said 'Hi' to me! I am Sahil Joshi and though I don't like English,I have never scored good marks in it,I am not good at speaking and writing it.But I love to do the things which challenge me and my ability.It improves me as a person and points out my mistakes and encourage me to learn more about it.So,that's why I love to create Blogs on various different topics.HAPPY READING! THANK YOU!!
